category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 12 (Payment of expenses)
contents: Article 12 (Payment of Expenses) Pursuant to Article 45, Paragraph 5 of the Articles of Incorporation, compensation, salary allowances, etc. shall not be paid to committee members. However, the minimum actual expenses necessary to perform work may be paid. Revised 2017. 4. 3., 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5.
